Reviews.Title: descent for broadcast and netflix, leaves much to be desired for games
Reviews.Author: spraynpray
Reviews.Content: I got this TV as a gift for Christmas, it is wonderful for watching TV but you will need s setbox, or digital tuner seperate, Hooked up to the ps3 it does bulimia and netflix just fine but my 720p he games look much better and crisped on a 26" wide screen computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Defective Unit received!!
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I would rate this a MINUS 1 Star!!  This unit was Christmas gift.  I took it to the person and dropped it off.  They called me back a couple of hours later to tell me that there was something wrong with the set.  I went all the way back, picked it up and checked it and sure enough it was dead as dead could be, no power to the unit at all. Ruined my Christmas present to this person.

ProductInfo.Features:
1366 x 768 native resolution
Connections: 2-HDMI, component, 2-composite, RCA L/R stereo, PC, coaxial digital audio out and RG6
DVD player supports DVD, CD-DA, CD-R/RW, DVD-R/RW, and MP3, JPEG and WMA file formats
14ms response time, 1400:1 contrast ratio and Brightness 400cd/m2
Panel: 29 15/16" W x 19 7/8" H x 3 3/16" D and VESA mount pattern 200 x 100
ProductInfo.Name: Sansui 32IN HD LCD DVD Combo
